content_json.title: Booking and Payment
content_json.content: All lessons must be booked in advance. Payment is required at the time of booking. We accept all major credit cards and digital payment methods.

content_json.title: Cancellation Policy
content_json.content: Lessons can be cancelled or rescheduled with at least 24 hours notice. Cancellations with less than 24 hours notice may incur a cancellation fee.

content_json.title: Vehicle and Insurance
content_json.content: All lessons are conducted in fully insured, dual-control vehicles. Students must hold a valid learner's permit or provisional license.

content_json.title: Instructor Policies
content_json.content: Our instructors are fully licensed and accredited. Lessons may be terminated early if the student is under the influence of alcohol or drugs, or exhibits unsafe behavior.
